title: This AI travel app sets you up with cheap flights, hotels and rental cars for life
description: Travel in style for less with this AI travel app. Get a lifetime subscription to OneAir Elite and save on airfare, hotels and rental cars. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: Travel in style for less with this AI travel app. Get a lifetime subscription to OneAir Elite and save on airfare, hotels and rental cars.
text: Deals Save on all your travel needs with a lifetime sub to OneAir. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Airfare is getting more expensive, and those prices won’t improve during peak travel times. With one of the best AI flight scanners on the market, and exclusive prenegotiated travel deals, OneAir’s Elite plan stands apart from the pack. It’s an AI travel app that can help you save on flights, hotels and rental cars for life. And thanks to a limited-time sale, you can get a lifetime membership to OneAir Elite for just $59.99 with discount code FLY30. That’s a massive discount off the regular price of $790. OneAir: AI travel app helps you save on airfare, rental cars and more Airlines often offer discounts due to cancellations, fuel-pricing fluctuations and other reasons. But, as you can imagine, those bargains usually don’t last long. With OneAir, you can deploy artificial intelligence that looks for those bargains 24/7. When the bot finds one for your destination, it sends you an email or alert on your mobile device. Then you can book at your leisure. You can personalize those alerts to suit your exact specifications. Plus, become a OneAir member and you will enjoy exclusive access to private and corporate fares at prenegotiated rates. Those could save you $500 on average for international economy flights and up to $2,000 on business-class flights. Discounts on hotels, rental cars and activities And that’s just the beginning of the perks when you sign up for this AI travel app. OneAir Elite members can get up to 60% off stays at select hotels, plus significant discounts on rental cars, activities and more. It’s basically a one-stop shop for affordable vacation planning. Plus, the service earned full accreditation from the International Airlines Travel Agent Network. With this deal on OneAir, you can make up your lifetime membership cost on your first flight alone. In fact, you’ll likely save enough that you can start loading up on the best travel accessories for Apple fans so you’ll really enjoy your upcoming vacations. Get a lifetime deal on a highly rated travel solution It’s no surprise that OneAir earns a five-star rating. “I am so pleased with my decision to sign up with OneAir!” verified buyer Ashok wrote recently. “Just booked a super cheap flight deal to Vancouver along with 5 nights of hotel stays.” Travel in style for less with an AI travel app, fully fine-tuned to find you great deals. Grab a lifetime subscription to the OneAir Elite plan for just $59.99 with code FLY30 at checkout. This price drop ends at 11:59 p.m. Pacific on June 1, 2025. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post on AI travel app OneAir Elite on September 21, 2023. We updated the pricing info.
html:
• Deals

Airfare is getting more expensive, and those prices won’t improve during peak travel times. With one of the best AI flight scanners on the market, and exclusive prenegotiated travel deals, OneAir’s Elite plan stands apart from the pack. It’s an AI travel app that can help you save on flights, hotels and rental cars for life.

And thanks to a limited-time sale, you can get a lifetime membership to OneAir Elite for just $59.99 with discount code FLY30. That’s a massive discount off the regular price of $790.

OneAir: AI travel app helps you save on airfare, rental cars and more

Airlines often offer discounts due to cancellations, fuel-pricing fluctuations and other reasons. But, as you can imagine, those bargains usually don’t last long. With OneAir, you can deploy artificial intelligence that looks for those bargains 24/7. When the bot finds one for your destination, it sends you an email or alert on your mobile device. Then you can book at your leisure.

You can personalize those alerts to suit your exact specifications. Plus, become a OneAir member and you will enjoy exclusive access to private and corporate fares at prenegotiated rates. Those could save you $500 on average for international economy flights and up to $2,000 on business-class flights.

Discounts on hotels, rental cars and activities

And that’s just the beginning of the perks when you sign up for this AI travel app. OneAir Elite members can get up to 60% off stays at select hotels, plus significant discounts on rental cars, activities and more. It’s basically a one-stop shop for affordable vacation planning. Plus, the service earned full accreditation from the International Airlines Travel Agent Network.

With this deal on OneAir, you can make up your lifetime membership cost on your first flight alone. In fact, you’ll likely save enough that you can start loading up on the best travel accessories for Apple fans so you’ll really enjoy your upcoming vacations.

Get a lifetime deal on a highly rated travel solution

It’s no surprise that OneAir earns a five-star rating. “I am so pleased with my decision to sign up with OneAir!” verified buyer Ashok wrote recently. “Just booked a super cheap flight deal to Vancouver along with 5 nights of hotel stays.”

Travel in style for less with an AI travel app, fully fine-tuned to find you great deals. Grab a lifetime subscription to the OneAir Elite plan for just $59.99 with code FLY30 at checkout. This price drop ends at 11:59 p.m. Pacific on June 1, 2025.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals
